old:
<COL ffdc78>《鍛練の小部屋》では戦闘のフローや
ジョブ毎の立ち回りの練習を行う事ができます</COL>

また、受付のNPCに話しかける事で
捕獲された数種類の敵と模擬戦闘も行えます

新しいスキルは
鍛練の小部屋で慣らしてから
実戦に出るようにすると安心です
new:
<COL ffdc78>In the "Training Room", you can practice the flow of combat and the behavior of each job.</COL>

You can also talk to the NPC at the reception and have mock battles with several types of captured enemies.

You can get used to your new skills in the Training Room before going into battle.
